###- Server & Steam Ports - DO NOT EDIT

server_port 20101
steam_communications_port 8701
steam_query_port 27001



###- Server Settings - EDIT IN STARTUP TAB

server_name New Holdfast NaW Server - Army Front
server_welcome_message Welcome to my new game server!
server_region usa
server_admin_password ChangeThisPassword
#server_password ChangeThisPassword



###- Server Intro Message

#server_intro_title Welcome To The Community!
#server_intro_body Greetings ladies and gentleman. Welcome to the <b>community!</b><br><br>Come join us on our Discord. We look forward to seeing you there. <br><br><b><color=yellow>discord.gg/holdfastgame</color></b>



###- Bandwidth & Performance Settings

network_broadcast_mode LowBandwidth



###- Player Population Settings

population_low_min_players 30
population_medium_min_players 50
population_high_min_players 100



###- Global Gameplay & Map Settings

artillery_fieldgun_respawn_timer 120
artillery_rocketlauncher_respawn_timer 120
map_rotation_start_randomise true



###- Map Rotations

#--- Rotation Group 1 --- 


#1 = Spanish Farm (Battlefield) - Calm | Morning (9) [Pop - Very Low, Low, Medium & High]
!map_rotation start
map_name spanishfarm
game_mode ArmyBattlefield
round_time_minutes 20
reinforcements_per_faction 545
wave_spawn_time_seconds 10
wave_spawn_vehicle_time_seconds 20
spawn_immunity_timer 5
max_player_respawns -1
faction_balancing true
faction_balancing_discrepancy_amount 8
allow_midround_spawning true
allow_faction_switching true
allow_spectating true
minimum_players -1
maximum_players 150
time_hour 9
time_dynamic false
weather_preset calm
weather_dynamic false
faction_attacking french
faction_defending british
friendly_fire false
friendly_fire_melee_bounce false
damage_split 0
sappers_attacking_starting_materials 70
sappers_defending_starting_materials 70
sappers_buildlimit explosivebarrel attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit explosivebarrel defending 3
sappers_buildlimit palisade attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit palisade defending 3
sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform defending 3
population_verylow_playable true
population_low_playable true
population_medium_playable true
population_high_playable true
max_accumulated_faction_points -1

#RC Commands - Idle Cavalry
#rc set secondsToPassAfterDismounted 30
#rc set secondsSpawnedBeforeDespawn 30
#rc set secondsToPassAfterHealthUpdated 15

!map_rotation end


#2 = Camp Salamanca (Battlefield) - Calm | Morning (8) [Pop - Medium & High]
!map_rotation start
map_name campsalamanca
game_mode ArmyBattlefield
round_time_minutes 20
reinforcements_per_faction 545
wave_spawn_time_seconds 10
wave_spawn_vehicle_time_seconds 20
spawn_immunity_timer 5

faction_balancing true
faction_balancing_discrepancy_amount 8
allow_midround_spawning true
allow_faction_switching true
allow_spectating true
minimum_players -1
maximum_players 150
time_hour 8
time_dynamic false
weather_preset calm4
weather_dynamic false
faction_attacking prussian 
faction_defending french
friendly_fire false
friendly_fire_melee_bounce false
damage_split 0
sappers_attacking_starting_materials 100
sappers_defending_starting_materials 100
sappers_buildlimit explosivebarrel attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit explosivebarrel defending 3
sappers_buildlimit palisade attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit palisade defending 3
sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform defending 3
population_verylow_playable false
population_low_playable false
population_medium_playable true
population_high_playable true
max_accumulated_faction_points -1
!map_rotation end


#3 = Causeways (Conquest) - Fog | Morning (8) [Pop - Medium & High]

conquest_ticker_time_seconds 1
conquest_tickets_per_capture 150
faction_attacking british
faction_defending french

friendly_fire_melee_bounce false

sappers_defending_starting_materials 100

sappers_buildlimit explosivebarrel defending 3

sappers_buildlimit palisade defending 0

sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform defending 0

population_low_playable false
population_medium_playable true
population_high_playable true
max_accumulated_faction_points -1
!map_rotation end

sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform defending 3
population_verylow_playable true
population_low_playable true
population_medium_playable true
population_high_playable true
max_accumulated_faction_points -1
!map_rotation end

allow_spectating true

population_verylow_playable false

!map_rotation end

sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform attacking 3
sappers_buildlimit shootingplatform defending 3
population_verylow_playable false
population_low_playable false
population_medium_playable true
population_high_playable true
max_accumulated_faction_points -1
!map_rotation end
